title: "Fakeaway" katsu chicken curry
ingredients: ['100g breadcrumbs', '100g flour', '1 egg, beaten', '500g chicken breast or thigh fillets', 'vegetable oil for cooking', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '500ml vegetable stock', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '2 teaspoons honey', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', 'cooked white rice, to serve']
